title: Practical Text Analysis and Data Modeling for Financial Fraud Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge of Financial Accounting and Introductory Data Analysis
context.additional_context: Course where practitioners learn to analyze financial fraud patterns using corporate annual report text data. Operates in small groups (<10), with digital device-supported practical exercises.

learning_goals: They can extract meaningful thematic elements from annual reports using LDA (Latent Dirichlet Allocation) and STM (Structural Topic Modeling)
They can build predictive models by combining corporate financial data (size, leverage, fixed-asset ratio) with text analysis results
They can calculate and interpret model performance metrics for identifying companies with high fraud risk
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
